verses.verse: A <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of <S%H2265>Habakkuk,<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> set to victorious <S%H7692>music.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of your <S%H8088>fame.<s%> I stand in awe of your <S%H6467>deeds,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> Renew your <S%H6467>work<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H8141>years.<s%> In the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> make it <S%H3045>known.<s%> In <S%H7267>wrath,<s%> you <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H7355>mercy.<s%>

<S%H433>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H8487>Teman,<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6290>Paran.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%> His <S%H1935>glory<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and his <S%H8416>praise<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
His <S%H5051>splendor<s%> is like the <S%H216>sunrise.<s%> <S%H7161>Rays<s%> <S%H216>shine<s%> from his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> where his <S%H5797>power<s%> is <S%H2253>hidden.<s%>

He <S%H5975>stood,<s%> and <S%H4128>shook<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%> He <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and made the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5425>tremble.<s%> The <S%H5703>ancient<s%> <S%H2042>mountains<s%> were <S%H6327>crumbled.<s%> The <S%H5769>age-old<s%> <S%H1389>hills<s%> <S%H7817>collapsed.<s%> His <S%H1979>ways<s%> are <S%H5769>eternal.<s%>
I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H3572>Cushan<s%> in <S%H205>affliction.<s%> The <S%H3407>dwellings<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> <S%H7264>trembled.<s%>

Was <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2734>displeased<s%> with the <S%H5104>rivers?<s%> Was your <S%H639>anger<s%> against the <S%H5104>rivers,<s%> or your <S%H5678>wrath<s%> against the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> that you <S%H7392>rode<s%> on your <S%H5483>horses,<s%> on your <S%H4818>chariots<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation?<s%>

<S%H6181>You<s%> <S%H5783>uncovered<s%> your <S%H7198>bow.<s%> You called for <S%H4294>your<s%> <S%H7621>sworn<s%> <S%H562>arrows.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%> You <S%H1234>split<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> with <S%H5104>rivers.<s%>

The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H2342>you,<s%> and were afraid. The <S%H2230>storm<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> passed <S%H5674>by.<s%> The <S%H8415>deep<s%> <S%H5414>roared<s%> <S%H6963><s%> and lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> its <S%H3027>hands<s%> on <S%H7315>high.<s%>

The <S%H8121>sun<s%> and <S%H3394>moon<s%> stood <S%H5975>still<s%> in the <S%H2073>sky,<s%> at the <S%H216>light<s%> of your <S%H2671>arrows<s%> as they <S%H1980>went,<s%> at the <S%H5051>shining<s%> of your <S%H1300>glittering<s%> <S%H2595>spear.<s%>
You marched <S%H6805>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H2195>wrath.<s%> You <S%H1758>threshed<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> in <S%H639>anger.<s%>

You went <S%H3318>forth<s%> for the <S%H3468>salvation<s%> of your <S%H5971>people,<s%> for the <S%H3468>salvation<s%> of your <S%H4899>anointed.<s%> You <S%H4272>crushed<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1004>land<s%> of <S%H7563>wickedness.<s%> You <S%H6168>stripped<s%> them <S%H6677>head<s%> to <S%H3247>foot.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

You <S%H5344>pierced<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of his <S%H6518>warriors<s%> with their own <S%H4294>spears.<s%> They came as a <S%H5590>whirlwind<s%> to <S%H6327>scatter<s%> <S%H5951>me,<s%> gloating as if to <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H6041>wretched<s%> in <S%H4565>secret.<s%>

I <S%H8085>heard,<s%> and my <S%H990>body<s%> <S%H7264>trembled.<s%> My <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H6750>quivered<s%> at the <S%H6963>voice.<s%> <S%H7538>Rottenness<s%> <S%H935>enters<s%> into my <S%H6106>bones,<s%> and I <S%H7264>tremble<s%> in my <S%H5117>place,<s%> because I must wait quietly for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> for the coming <S%H5927>up<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> who invade <S%H1464>us.<s%>

For though the fig <S%H8384>tree<s%> <S%H6524>doesn't<s%> flourish, nor <S%H2981>fruit<s%> be in the <S%H1612>vines;<s%> the <S%H4639>labor<s%> of the <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H3584>fails,<s%> the <S%H7709>fields<s%> <S%H6213>yield<s%> no <S%H400>food;<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> are cut <S%H1504>off<s%> from the <S%H4356>fold,<s%> and there is no <S%H1241>herd<s%> in the <S%H7517>stalls:<s%>
yet I will <S%H5937>rejoice<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> I will be <S%H1523>joyful<s%> in the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation!<s%>

<S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> is my <S%H2428>strength.<s%> He <S%H7760>makes<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> like <S%H355>deer<s%>'s <S%H1869>feet,<s%> and enables me to go in high <S%H1116>places.<s%> For the music <S%H5329>director,<s%> on my stringed <S%H5058>instruments.<s%>
